app.and_use_GMX_with_its_built_in_browser: , and use GMX with its built-in browser

exchange.confirmation_box_warning: The spread is > 1%, please ensure the trade details are acceptable before confirming
exchange.confirmation_box_warning2: Fees are high to swap from {{ fromToken }} to {{ toToken }}.
exchange.confirmation_box_warning3: Fees are high to swap from {{ fromToken }} to {{ collateralToken }}.
exchange.confirmation_box_warning5: Increasing this position at the current price will forfeit a pending_profit of {{ existingPosition }}.
exchange.This_rule_only_applies_for_the_next_time: This rule only applies for the next {{ time }}, until {{ until }}.
exchange.confirmation_box_warning6: This order will forfeit a profit of {{ existingPosition }}.
exchange.confirmation_box_warning7: A minimum price change of 1.5% is required for a position to be in profit. This only applies for the first {{ minProfitTime }} hours after increasing a position.
exchange.confirmation_box_warning8: You have an active Limit Order to Increase {{ existingOrderType }} {{ sizeInToken }} {{ indexToken }} (${{existingOrderSizeDelta}}) at price ${{existingOrderTriggerPrice}}
exchange.There_may_not_be_sufficient_liquidity_to: There may not be sufficient liquidity to execute your order when the price conditions are met
exchange.The_order_will_only_execute_if_the_price: The order will only execute if the price conditions are met and there is sufficient liquidity
exchange.Your_positions_collateral_after_deductin: Your position's collateral after deducting fees.
exchange.You_can_change_this_in_the_settings_menu: You can change this in the settings menu on the top right of the page.
exchange.Note_that_a_low_allowed_slippage_e_g_les: Note that a low allowed slippage, e.g. less than 0.5%, may result in failed orders if prices are volatile.
exchange.You_will_receive_at_least_amount_symbol_: You will receive at least {{ amount }} {{ symbol }} if this order is executed. The execution price may vary depending on swap fees at the time the order is executed.
exchange.No_open_position_order_cannot_be_execute: No open position, order cannot be executed
exchange.Order_size_exceeds_position_size_order_c: Order size exceeds position size, order cannot be executed
exchange.The_price_that_the_order_can_be_executed: The price that the order can be executed at may differ slightly from the chart price as market orders can change the price while limit orders cannot.
exchange.There_is_no_open_position_for_the_order_: There is no open position for the order, it can't be executed
exchange.The_order_size_is_bigger_than_position_i: The order size is bigger than position, it can't be executed
exchange.Note_that_orders_are_not_guaranteed_to_b: Note that orders are not guaranteed to be executed.
exchange.This_can_occur_in_a_few_situations_inclu: This can occur in a few situations including but not exclusive to
exchange.Insufficient_liquidity_to_execute_the_or: Insufficient liquidity to execute the order
exchange.The_mark_price_which_is_an_aggregate_of_: The mark price which is an aggregate of exchange prices did not reach the specified price
exchange.The_specified_price_was_reached_but_not_: The specified price was reached but not long enough for it to be executed
exchange.No_keeper_picked_up_the_order_for_execut: No keeper picked up the order for execution
exchange.Additionally_trigger_orders_are_market_o: Additionally, trigger orders are market orders and are not guaranteed to settle at the trigger price.
exchange.Accept_that_orders_are_not_guaranteed_to: Accept that orders are not guaranteed to execute and trigger orders may not settle at the trigger price
exchange.Leave_at_least_amount_ETH_for_gas: Leave at least {{ amount }} ETH for gas
exchange.Requested_deposit_of_amount_collateralTo: Requested deposit of {{ amount }} {{ collateralTokenSymbol }} into {{ indexTokenSymbol }} {{ isLong }}.
exchange.Requested_withdrawal_of_amount_USD_from_: Requested withdrawal of {{ amount }} USD from {{ indexTokenSymbol }} {{ isLong }}.

buy_glp.page_description1: Purchase GLP tokens to earn {{ nativeTokenSymbol }} fees from swaps and leverages trading.
